title: M.E.D. Vol 80, No. 98
content:
How Tech Giants Cut Corners to Harvest Data for A.I.

YouTube’s CEO says that OpenAI training Sora with YouTube videos would violate YouTube’s ToS, and Google adheres to YouTube’s creator contracts to train Gemini ; Using naivety for gaslighting  Marc Andreessen asks? Is there any copyrighted content on Youtube that Google doesn’t have rights for?
